sentences.sContent: a birth control method that is cheap and reliable
sentences.sCn: 既便宜又可靠的避孕方法

sentences.sContent: Miller was a quiet and reliable man.
sentences.sCn: 米勒是个话不多且可靠的人。

sentences.sContent: ...It is actually quite difficult to find reliable statistics on the issue for many schools...

...This ability seems to carry with it certain cultural assumptions — that everything that can be measured should be measured; that data is a transparent and reliable lens that allows us to filter out emotionalism and ideology; that data will help us do remarkable things — like foretell the future...

remMethod.val: reli(看作rely， 信赖) ＋ able(能…的) → 可靠的， 可依赖的

trans.tranOther: someone or something that is reliable can be trusted or depended on
